venue.name: Sheraton Four Points Hotel and Conference Center

item.description:
Join us to dance and meet many other singles. This dance is being sponsored by, Plenty of Fish.com.

We will all meet first and then go and dance our feet off.

* Excellent opportunity to meet a wide variety of single people
* Upscale party in the enormous and lovely Tiffany Ballroom ~ classy atmosphere
* More than ample free parking – huge lot.
* Dance with your new friends to an awesome professional DJ (9 years experience) with plenty of great music & requests.
* Light fare provided
* Cash bar – reasonably priced; multiple bartenders
* Ice-breaker activities planned
* Dress to impress – no jeans or sneakers please
* Meet your Someone Special this Spring!
* This party is guaranteed to be a great time: $15 admission
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the lobby of the hotel

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: For the singles in the group....
